user.description: Configure statistics generation for Solar Forecast ML.

data_description.generate_monthly: Create a monthly report on the 1st of each month

energy_flow.title: Energy Flow Sensors
energy_flow.description:
Select sensors for the energy flow diagram.

All fields are optional! Only select the sensors you have available.

IMPORTANT: All sensors must provide current power in WATTS (W), NOT kWh!

data_description.sensor_solar_power: Current PV power in Watts (e.g. 3500 W). From your inverter. Typical range: 0-15000 W.
data_description.sensor_solar_to_house: Power flowing directly from PV to house in Watts. Without battery/grid portion. Typical range: 0-10000 W.
data_description.sensor_solar_to_battery: Power flowing from PV to battery in Watts. Typical range: 0-5000 W.
data_description.sensor_grid_to_house: Grid import for direct house consumption in Watts. Typical range: 0-20000 W.
data_description.sensor_grid_to_battery: Grid import for battery charging in Watts. Typical range: 0-5000 W.
data_description.sensor_house_to_grid: Export to grid in Watts. Typical range: 0-15000 W.
data_description.sensor_smartmeter_import: Current import power from smartmeter in Watts. Used for hourly billing.
data_description.sensor_smartmeter_export: Current export power from smartmeter in Watts. Used for hourly billing.

battery.title: Battery & Consumption
battery.description:
Sensors for battery status and home consumption.

All fields are optional!

SOC = Percent (0-100%), Power = Watts (W)

data_description.sensor_battery_soc: State of Charge in percent. Expected range: 0-100 (NOT 0-1!). Shows battery charge level.
data_description.sensor_battery_power: Current charge or discharge power in Watts. Positive = Charging, Negative = Discharging (or vice versa depending on system). Range: -10000 to +10000 W.
data_description.sensor_battery_to_house: Discharge power flowing to house in Watts. ONLY positive values! Typical range: 0-10000 W.
data_description.sensor_battery_to_grid: Battery discharge to grid in Watts. ONLY positive values! Typical range: 0-10000 W.
data_description.sensor_home_consumption: Total current home consumption in Watts. Typical range: 200-20000 W. Example: 1500 W.

statistics.title: Statistics Sensors & Weather (optional)
statistics.description:
Sensors for daily and yearly statistics.

All fields are optional!

IMPORTANT: Energy values expected in kWh here, NOT Watts!

data_description.sensor_solar_yield_daily: Total PV production today in kWh. Expected range: 0-100 kWh. Resets at midnight. Example: 15.3 kWh.
data_description.sensor_grid_import_daily: Total grid import today in kWh. Expected range: 0-100 kWh. Resets at midnight.
data_description.sensor_grid_import_yearly: Total grid import this year in kWh (meter reading). Expected range: 0-50000 kWh.
data_description.sensor_battery_charge_solar_daily: Energy charged from PV to battery today in kWh. Expected range: 0-50 kWh.
data_description.sensor_battery_charge_grid_daily: Energy charged from grid to battery today in kWh. Expected range: 0-50 kWh.
data_description.sensor_price_total: Current total electricity price incl. all fees in cents per kWh. Expected range: 15-80 ct/kWh. Example: 35.5 ct/kWh.
data_description.weather_entity: Home Assistant Weather integration (e.g. weather.home). Shows temperature, humidity, wind alongside solar forecast. Weather data is loaded from Solar Forecast ML.

panels.title: PV Panel Sensors (optional)
panels.description:
Configure up to 4 individual PV panels.

All fields are optional!

For each panel you can specify a name and a live watt sensor.

billing.title: Electricity Bill & Billing Period
billing.description:
Configure your billing period for the annual balance.

Start date = When does your billing year begin with your electricity provider?

kWh sensors must be 'total_increasing' (meter readings)!

data_description.billing_start_day: Day of month when your billing year starts. Example: 15 = the 15th of the month.
data_description.billing_start_month: Month when your billing year starts. Example: January = billing year starts on selected day in January.
data_description.billing_price_mode: Dynamic = hourly spot prices from Grid Price Monitor integration. Fixed = your fixed tariff price.
data_description.billing_fixed_price: Your electricity tariff price in cents per kWh. Only relevant in fixed price mode. Example: 35.0 for 35 ct/kWh.
data_description.sensor_smartmeter_import_kwh: Absolute meter reading for grid import in kWh. MUST be 'total_increasing' (always increasing). Example: sensor.power_meter_total_consumption with value like 12345.67 kWh.
data_description.sensor_smartmeter_export_kwh: Absolute meter reading for grid export in kWh. MUST be 'total_increasing'. Example: sensor.power_meter_total_export with value like 5432.10 kWh.
data_description.sensor_solar_yield_total_kwh: Absolute total yield of PV system in kWh. MUST be 'total_increasing'. Example: sensor.inverter_total_yield with value like 15000.00 kWh.
